attributes.action: Compel all councils to provide home recycling collections to every household as part of the standard refuse collection service by the end of 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To support efforts for everyone to be more environmentally aware.Collections should be available to every household for common materials such as glass, plastic etc. Currently depending upon the areas in which you live this service may or may not available, creating an artificial barrier to peoples efforts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
